description:
Back in the day when young Heizou used to call himself Tetsusaburo, a skilled man named Matsuoka Juubei entered the Takasugi Dojo during his lessons. Later, Heizou returns home where his father`s legal wife, Hatsu, calls him an illegitimate child. Dispirited, Heizou accepts an assignment to rob with his best friend, Samanosuke.
Source: amazon
